articles.title: Erectile dysfunction cream used to treat Glasgow woman's sore eye in prescription mix-up - Daily Record
articles.description: The lady ended up needing hospital treatment after she was given the wrong medication in error.
articles.content: A woman had to be treated in hospital after she was mistakenly given erectile dysfunction cream for a dry eye. The female patient from Glasgow was given the wrong medication to treat her condition following a mix-up with her prescription. She suffered discomf… [+2178 chars]

articles.description: Your fasting plan can be healthy - but only if you do it right.

articles.author: Karolina Kaminska
articles.title: Vitamin B12 deficiency: The best foods containing vitamin B12 to add to your diet - Express
articles.description: VITAMIN B12 deficiency can sometimes be caused by not including enough vitamin B12 in your diet. If you are experiencing symptoms of a deficiency, eat more of these B12-rich foods.

articles.description: He's treating five dogs a week
